isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR LATCH

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Latch on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 214 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab door latch (Item 1) onto inner cab door handle control rods (Items 2 and 3) and rotate the cab door latch up around inner cab door handle control rods, driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 214. Cab Door Latch and Inner Cab Door Handle Control Rods

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD
3. INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 89 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: With the front cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 73) placed on a suitable work surface. Position the hanger support bracket (Item 4) of the cab door latch (Item 1) in place at window run channel (Item 2) and slide the hanger support bracket into window run channel until the locking tab (Item 3) locks it in place, driver side shown.

Install front cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to
MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY
. For installing front cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to Install Front Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to
CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For installing front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Install Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install front cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If front cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. If front cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door latch.

svcsubproc.title: Install Rear Cab Door Latch on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 214 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position cab door latch (Item 1) onto inner cab door handle control rods (Items 2 and 3) and rotate the cab door latch up around inner cab door handle control rods, driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 89 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: With the rear cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 75) placed on a suitable work surface. Position the hanger support bracket (Item 4) of the cab door latch (Item 1) in place at window run channel (Item 2) and slide the hanger support bracket into window run channel until the locking tab (Item 3) locks it in place, driver side shown.

Install rear cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to
MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY
. For installing rear cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to
CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For installing rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.

Install rear cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If rear cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models. If rear cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Install Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks on Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side rear cab door latch.
